property.name: Text
property.value: When the upgraded character attacks - Reveal the top card of your deck. If it's an Action, you may play it.

property.name: Text
property.value: If one of your cards would cause a Weapon or Armor to be scrapped from the upgraded character - Scrap this card instead.

property.name: Text
property.value: Put on Trucks only. When the upgraded character does attack damage to an enemy - Your opponent flips that enemy to it's other mode.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reveal - When one of your characters defends. When Revealed - Draw 2 cards. Then put a card from your hand on top of your deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: Enemies can't use Brave or Stealth this turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reveal - When one of your characters defends. When Revealed - You may play an Armor onto the defender.

property.name: Text
property.value: You may play an Action. Then you may play another Action.

property.name: Text
property.value: One of your characters gets +2 ATK and Pierce 2 until end of turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: Move up to 5 damage counters from one of your Decepticon leaders that has 8 Stars or more to one of your other characters.

property.name: Text
property.value: Put on Melee characters only. When the upgraded character is defending against a Specialist - The upgraded character has +1 Armor.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reveal - When one of your characters defends. When Revealed - Your opponent can't flip more than 4 battle cards during this battle.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reveal - When one of your characters defends. When Revealed - Each of your characters get +1 [Def] until end of turn..

property.name: Text
property.value: Scrap one of your Upgrades - Scrap up to 2 enemy Upgrades of the same type as your scrapped Upgrade.

property.name: Text
property.value: Scrap an enemy Weapon or Armor.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this is scrapped from a character - Scrap an enemy Weapon.

property.name: Text
property.value: If the upgraded character defends and would take an even amount of attack damage - Instead it takes no attack damage. When the upgraded chracter defends and takes no attack damage - Scrap this card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Put only on characters that have 11 Stars or more. The upgraded character has +4 Health.

property.name: Text
property.value: At the start of your turn - Do 1 damage to the upgraded character. When the upgraded character is KO'd - Do 2 damage to each enemy.

property.name: Text
property.value: Tough 1. When you put this on a character - You may play another Extra Padding. Up to 3 Extra Paddings can fit in 1 Armor slot.

property.name: Text
property.value: Put on Firecons only. Each of your Firecons has Bold 1.

property.name: Text
property.value: If the upgraded character would take 5 or more attack damage - Instead scrap this card and the upgraded character takes 4 attack damage.

property.name: Text
property.value: Your opponent chooses one of their characters and does one damage to it. If your starting team was only Decepticons - Your opponent does 1 more damage to the chosen character.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reveal the top 3 cards of your deck. If the include at least [O][B][W], put them all into your hand. Otherwise scrap them.

property.name: Text
property.value: Choose one of your characters. You may play a Weapon, an Armor, and a Utility onto it.

property.name: Text
property.value: All characters get Bold 3 and Tough 3 until end of turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: Tap one of your untapped Autobots. Add its [ATK] total to one of your untapped Autobots until end of turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reveal - After your opponent chooses an attacker and before they choose a defender. When Revealed - One of your characters gets Stealth until end of turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reveal - When your opponent plays an [O] Action. When Revealed - Scrap that Action and it has no effect.

property.name: Text
property.value: Put on characters that have 7 Stars or fewer. Pierce 3.

property.name: Text
property.value: Put on Shockwave only. Up to 2 LV Gamma-Disruptor Launchers can fir in 1 Weapon slot. When you put this on Shockwave - Your opponent chooses a card from their hand and scraps it.

property.name: Text
property.value: Put on Autobots only. If the upgraded character would take non-attack damage - Instead it takes that much damages minus one.

property.name: Text
property.value: Repair 2 damage from one of your characters.

property.name: Text
property.value: When the upgraded character attacks - Reveal the top card of your deck. If it's an Upgrade, you may play it.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you use the upgraded character's [Tap] ability - Untap that character and scrap this card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Pierce 1. When this is scrapped from a character - Scrap an enemy Utility.

property.name: Text
property.value: While the upgraded character is defending against an enemy that has Pierce - Reduce that enemy's Pierce total by 2.

property.name: Text
property.value: Flip each of your characters from bot mode to Motorcycle mode. You get an extra attack this turn, but only a Motorcycle can attack this way.

property.name: Text
property.value: Choose one - Move an Upgrade from one of your characters to another one. OR Put a Battle Master Upgrade from your KO area onto one of your characters.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this is scrapped from a character - Scrap an enemy Armor.

property.name: Text
property.value: Put on Ranged characters only. While the upgraded character is defending against a Melee enemy - The upgraded character has +1 [Def].

property.name: Text
property.value: Scrap a card from your hand. Then draw 2 cards.

property.name: Text
property.value: Do 1 damage to a tapped enemy.

property.name: Text
property.value: When the upgraded character attacks and you don't flip a [Bl] - Scrap this card after the battle.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reveal - When one of your characters is KO'd. When Revealed - Instead of scrapping that character's Upgrades, you may put any number of them onto one of your other characters.

property.name: Text
property.value: Repair 1 damage from one of your characters. If your starting team was only Autobots - Draw a card.

property.name: Text
property.value: You may play a Secret Action. Then you may play another Secret Action.

property.name: Text
property.value: When the upgraded character battles and you flip your first [W] - Flip 1 extra battle card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Choose on of yout characters. When it does attack damage this turn to an enemy that has fewer Stars than it - Do 1 damage to each enemy that has fewer Stars than your character.

property.name: Text
property.value: One of your characters gets +2 [Atk] until end of turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: Put on Specialist only. While the upgraded character is defending against a Ranged enemy - THe upgraded character has +1 [Def].

property.name: Text
property.value: Reveal - If one or more of your characters would take non-attack damage during your opponent's turn. When Revealed - Instead your characters can't take non-attack damage this turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: Choose one of your characters. If it's a Tank, your opponent chooses 2 cards from their hand and scraps them. If it's a Plane, your opponent chooses one of their characters and does 2 damage to it.

property.name: Text
property.value: Flip one of your Spaceships to bot mode. Then flip it back to alt mode.

property.name: Text
property.value: Tough 1. When you put this on a character - You may play another Extra Padding. Up to 3 Extra Paddings can fit in 1 Armor slot.

property.name: Text
property.value: When the upgraded character battles - Each player can't flip more than 2 battle cards during this battle.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you flip to this mode - Return an [O] Action from your scrap pile to hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: After you flip battle cards for this character's attack and before defense flips - You may play one of the [B] Actions you flipped.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you flip to this mode - Move any number of damage counters from one of your other characters to this, but not enough to KO her.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this is KO'd - Scrap the top card of your deck. You may play it. Then scrap another card from the top of your deck. You may play it.

property.name: Text
property.value: This can't take non-attack damage from your opponent's cards.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this attacks and has a Weapon - You may swap that Weapon with a [B] Weapon from your hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you flip to this mode - Do 1 damage to an enemy that has no Upgrades.

property.name: Text
property.value: When an Upgrade is scrapped from an enemy - Do 1 damage to that enemy.

property.name: Text
property.value: Before the game begins - You may reveal a Brainstorm from your deck and put it into your hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you play your third Action during your turn - Draw a card.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you flip to this mode - Do damage to an enemy equal to the number of Weapons you have on the battlefield.

property.name: Text
property.value: At the start of your turn, if this has 3 or more Upgrades - Do 1 damage to each enemy.

property.name: Text
property.value: Each of your other characters has Bold 1 and Tough 1.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this attacks an enemy that has a Weapon - Do 2 damage to that enemy.

property.name: Text
property.value: You may look at the top card of your deck at any time. When you flip to this mode - Draw a card. Then your opponent chooses a cards from their hand and scraps it.

property.name: Text
property.value: You may look at the top card of your deck at any time. While the top card of your deck is a Decepticon card or a Secret Action - You may play it as though it were in your hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: Each of your Spy Patrol has +1 [Def]

property.name: Text
property.value: When this attacks - Untap each of your Spy Patrols.

card.name: Major Ultra Magnus - Infantry, City Commander

property.name: Text
property.value: Before the game begins - You may put an Ultra Magnus Armor from your deck onto this. Brave

alternate.name: Major Ultra Magnus - Infantry, City Commander

property.name: Text
property.value: When this attacks and you flip at least [O][O][B][B] - Do 1 damage to EACH character.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this has a Weapon - She has Bold 1 and Tough 1.

property.name: Text
property.value: When the upgraded character attacks - Scrap any number of cards from your hand. For each one scrapped this way, the upgraded character gets +1 [Atk] until end of turn. If this would leave the battlefield - Put it into your KO area instead.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this attacks - Draw a card.

property.name: Text
property.value: [Tap]: Scrap a [O] card from your hand - You may play an Upgrade.

property.name: Text
property.value: Bold 4. When the upgraded character attacks - Plan 1. If this would leave the battlefield - Put it into your KO area instad.

property.name: Text
property.value: [Tap]: Scrap a [Bl] card from your hand - Move 1 damage counter from one of your characters to an enemy.

property.name: Text
property.value: When the upgraded character attacks and you flip at least [W][W] - The defender's base [Def] becomes 0 during this battle. If this would leave the battlefield - Put it into your KO area instead.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you flip to this mode - Repair 1 damage from one of your characters.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this attacks and you flip at least [W][O][B] - This gets +3 [Atk] until the end of turn.

card.name: Private Red Heat - Infantry, Emergency Response

alternate.name: Private Red Heat - Infantry, Emergency Response

property.name: Text
property.value: [Tap]: Scrap a [W] card from your hand - Choose 2 of your characters and swap all their Upgrades.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you flip to this mode - This gets +2 [Atk] until end of turn for each character in your KO area.

property.name: Text
property.value: When one of your other characters is KO'd during your opponent's turn - Untap this.

property.name: Text
property.value: [Tap]: Scrap a [W] card from your hand - Flip one of your characters to its other mode.

card.name: Private Top Shot - Artillery, Patrol Leader

alternate.name: Private Top Shot - Artillery, Patrol Leader

property.name: Text
property.value: [Tap]: Scrap a [O] card from your hand - Draw 2 Cards, then put a card from your hand on top of your deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: [Tap]: Scrap a [Bl] card from your hand - Untap one of your characters that has 6 Stars or lower.

card.name: Private Trailbreaker - Infantry, Fortification and Defense

property.name: Text
property.value: Before the game begins - You may put a Force Field from your deck onto this.

alternate.name: Private Trailbreaker - Infantry, Fortification and Defense

property.name: Text
property.value: While this has an Armor - He has Brave.

property.name: Text
property.value: When the upgraded character attacks and you flip at least [B][B][B]- Do 3 damage to the defender. If this would leave the battlefield - Put it into your KO area instead.

card.name: Private Downshift - Special Ops, Security Agent

alternate.name: Private Downshift - Special Ops, Security Agent
